snippet.title: Baldurs Gate 2  - Throne of Baal - E3 Promotion Video
snippet.description:
This is a old Baldurs Gate 2  Throne of Baal  Promotion Video which was shown on E3.
It shows Gameplay scenes.
I love this Game verry much and i played it a lot,simply one of the Best Games ever made
